Pre-Game Insights: The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit went 14-68 overall a season ago while going 7-33 at home.
Los Angeles finished 47-35 overall last season while going 19-21 on the road.
The Pistons averaged 109.9 points per game last season, 49.9 in the paint, 14.5 off of turnovers and 14.3 on fast breaks.
The Lakers allowed opponents to score 117.4 points per game and shoot 47.4% from the field last season.
Pistons: Bobi Klintman: out (calf), Ausar Thompson: out (illness).
Lakers: Jarred Vanderbilt: out (foot), Christian Wood: out (knee), Christian Koloko: day to day (illness).
